statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, LENGTH(purchase_history) AS history_length FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(purchase_history) > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(customer_name) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, join_date FROM Customers ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT p.product_name, p.unit_price, ps.segment_name FROM products p JOIN customer_segments ps ON p.product_id = ps.segment_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pr.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.purchase_id = p.product_id ORDER BY pr.total_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers c JOIN segments s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN segments ON customers.customer_id = segments.customer_id;
